resource_dependency.postSchema: Table: posts; Fields: id (UUID), title (string), content (text), topic_id (foreign key to topics.id), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.replySchema: Table: replies; Fields: id (UUID), post_id (foreign key to posts.id), content (text), parent_reply_id (self-referencing foreign key for nested replies), created_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.topicSchema: Table: topics; Fields: id (UUID), name (string), description (text)

function: Enable users to create anonymous discussion posts and reply to existing ones while maintaining data integrity through structured database relationships.
static_description: A form with a title input field, content text area, topic selector dropdown populated from available topics, and a submit button. Replies appear beneath their respective posts in threaded format with timestamps but no author identifiers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button creates a new post with provided title, content, selected topic, and current timestamp. Reply submissions append to the corresponding thread without revealing identity.

resource_dependency.sessionManagementAPI: REST endpoint /api/auth/session returning session validity status
resource_dependency.anonymousTokenGenerator: Internal service generating temporary UUID tokens for anonymous sessions

function: Allow students to participate anonymously without requiring account registration or login credentials while preserving session continuity.
static_description: No visible login/logout controls or user profile elements. All interactions occur under automatically assigned temporary identifiers managed server-side.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon visiting any page, client checks for existing session token. If absent, generates a new anonymous token via internal service and stores it securely for subsequent requests.

resource_dependency.searchEndpoint: GET /api/search?q={query}&type=post|topic returns filtered results based on keyword matching
resource_dependency.browsePostsEndpoint: GET /api/posts?page={number}&limit={count} retrieves paginated list of public posts ordered by creation date

function: Provide mechanisms for discovering relevant discussions through browsing latest posts or searching keywords within post titles, contents, and associated topics.
static_description: Top navigation bar includes a search bar centered above main content feed showing latest posts. Search icon triggers query submission; clear button resets filters.

interaction_and_states.description: As user types into search bar, debounced live suggestions may appear below based on partial matches in titles/topics.
Clicking search icon or pressing enter submits typed query to backend which responds with matching posts/topics displayed in dedicated view.
Reaching bottom of post feed triggers infinite scroll loading next batch of posts until exhausted.

resource_dependency.followTopicEndpoint: POST /api/topics/{id}/follow toggles follow state for authenticated session
resource_dependency.subscriptionsDataSchema: Table: subscriptions; Fields: session_token (string), topic_id (foreign key to topics.id), followed_at (timestamp)

function: Allow users to subscribe to topics they're interested in to easily access related future content.
static_description: Each topic listing displays a toggleable heart/follow icon beside its name. Active follows show filled icon with tooltip indicating number of followers.

interaction_and_states.description: Tapping the follow icon adds/removes the current topic from userâ€™s followed list stored server-side and updates local display accordingly.

resource_dependency.notificationWebSocket: Establish WebSocket connection at /ws/notifications to push real-time alerts about replies and followed-topic activity
resource_dependency.notificationPreferencesSchema: Table: notification_settings; Fields: session_token (string), notify_on_reply (boolean), notify_on_new_followed_topic_post (boolean)

function: Deliver immediate feedback when someone replies to a user's post or when new content appears in followed topics.
static_description: Bell-shaped icon in top right corner shows unread count badge when active notifications exist. Dropdown menu lists recent alerts chronologically.

interaction_and_states.description: Server emits events upon reply creation or new post in followed topic triggering visual alert and updating unread counter instantly.
Opening notification panel marks all as read and clears badge indicator temporarily.

resource_dependency.databaseConnectionConfig: Connects to PostgreSQL instance using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp

function: Ensure persistent storage of forum data including posts, replies, topics, and user preferences using secure database connections.
static_description: Not directly visible in UI but enables reliable backend operations handling CRUD actions against defined tables.

resource_dependency.fetchAPIClient: All frontend components use standardized fetch wrapper making HTTP calls to defined REST endpoints

function: Dynamically populate UI elements with live data sourced exclusively from backend services rather than hardcoded values.
static_description: Initial render waits for API responses before displaying content such as posts, topics, or user settings.

interaction_and_states.description: On mounting, each interactive section initiates async request(s) to appropriate endpoint(s) retrieving required data for rendering.

resource_dependency.dataEncryptionPolicy: Sensitive fields like session tokens encrypted at rest; communication secured over HTTPS only

function: Protect student anonymity and prevent unauthorized tracking or exposure of personally identifiable information throughout usage lifecycle.
static_description: Implements transparent privacy safeguards ensuring no direct linkage between individuals and posted content visible to others.

function: Apply consistent visual styling aligned with requested color palette enhancing usability and brand identity.
static_description: Site background rendered in honeydew (#F0FFF0). Interactive components styled with dark olive green (#556B2F) borders/text.

resource_dependency.postsTableDefinition: CREATE TABLE posts (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, topic_id UUID REFERENCES topics(id), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())
resource_dependency.repliesTableDefinition: CREATE TABLE replies (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, post_id UUID REFERENCES posts(id), content TEXT NOT NULL, parent_reply_id UUID REFERENCES replies(id), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())
resource_dependency.topicsTableDefinition: CREATE TABLE topics (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, description TEXT)
resource_dependency.preferencesTableDefinition: CREATE TABLE user_preferences (session_token TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, notify_on_reply BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, notify_on_new_followed_topic_post BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE)

function: Define relational database structure capable of storing hierarchical discussion threads, categorized topics, and individualized user settings.
static_description: Logical organization of tables enabling efficient querying and indexing strategies for common forum operations.

function: Expose standard web methods allowing full lifecycle management of core entities via predictable URL patterns.
static_description: Well-documented interface facilitating frontend-backend synchronization during development and testing phases.

resource_dependency.fullTextSearchIndex: PostgreSQL tsvector index built on posts.title and posts.content columns for optimized text searches

function: Support fast, accurate discovery of relevant content spanning multiple categories and posting histories.
static_description: Search bar leverages indexed backend capabilities returning ranked results sorted by relevance score.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting search term triggers backend lookup utilizing full-text indexing returning paginated result set with highlighted excerpts.

resource_dependency.manageSubscriptionsUI: Modal dialog accessible via user menu presenting editable list of currently followed topics with remove option per item

function: Offer centralized control panel for reviewing and modifying topic subscription choices after initial selection.
static_description: Accessible dropdown menu contains link opening overlay window listing all subscribed topics alongside unsubscribe buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting 'Manage Topics' opens modal pre-populated with current subscriptions. Clicking X removes topic immediately from list and backend record.

resource_dependency.notificationSettingsEndpoint: PATCH /api/settings/notification updates user preference flags according to submitted changes

function: Empower users to customize how and when they receive alerts regarding community engagement affecting them.
static_description: Settings screen displays checkboxes labeled 'Notify me when someone replies to my post' and 'Notify me about new posts in followed topics'.

interaction_and_states.description: Changing checkbox states sends PATCH request updating corresponding boolean flags tied to current session identifier in backend table.

resource_dependency.concurrentDevScript: "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev --prefix frontend\" \"npm run dev --prefix backend\"" added to root package.json scripts block

function: Streamline local development workflow by simultaneously launching frontend and backend processes with single command execution.
static_description: Developers execute one terminal command to initiate hot-reloading environments for both application layers side-by-side.
